title: Happy Season
lyrics:
There’s no problems
Kids just dreamin’
You’re not alone when it’s happy season
(It’s happy season, it’s happy season oh yeah
It’s happy season, it’s happy season oh yeah)



I’m walking like

I’ve got a fresh new psyche

I’m livin’ like “why not”

The past behind me



Don’t have to decide it

Just write/ride [?] it

Let’s see where this goes

No fighting



Good times baby

Everyday yeah

It’s happy season

Champagne for no reason

Good times baby

Everyday yeah

It’s happy season

Ooh I love that feeling



(It’s happy season, it’s happy season oh yeah

It’s happy season, it’s happy season oh yeah)



I can’t contain

But then again, I ain’t tryin’

You call it strange, I can’t explain

But I won’t hide it



Used to bein’ quiet

Thanks to you I can’t be silent, no



Good times baby

Everyday yeah

It’s happy season

Champagne for no reason

Good times baby

Everyday yeah

It’s happy season

Ooh I love that feeling

(It’s happy season, it’s happy season oh yeah

It’s happy season, ooh I love that feeling

It’s happy season, it’s happy season oh yeah

It’s happy season, ooh I love that feeling oh yeah)



There’s no problems

Kids just dreamin’

You’re not alone when it’s happy season

There’s no problems

Kids just dreamin’

You’re not alone when it’s happy season



Good times baby

Everyday yeah

It’s happy season

Champagne for no reason

Good times baby

Everyday yeah

It’s happy season

Ooh I love that feeling



It’s happy season, it’s happy season oh yeah

It’s happy season, ooh I love that feeling

It’s happy season, it’s happy season oh yeah

It’s happy season, ooh I love that feeling

It’s happy season, it’s happy season oh yeah

It’s happy season, ooh I love that feeling
